summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. THE VEHICLE WAS PREVIOUSLY SERVICED UNDER NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V530000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM) HOWEVER, THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE FAILURE RECURRED SEVERAL TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO GUNN CHEVROLET LOCATED AT 16550 I-35, SELMA, TX 78154 WHERE THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DIAGNOSE THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND STATED THAT THEY COULD NOT ASSIST AS THE RECALL REPAIR HAD ALREADY BEEN PERFORMED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 99,000.
